songs.lyrics:
[B.o.B]
The world is a battlefield, the fight is a fireplace
We train to sustain, so how much pain can you tolerate
The goal is to dominate competition annihilate
We hunger for victory, it’s a dish that we gotta taste
It’s a good life we chasing, my shoes on I laced them
We don’t get complacent cause each step is greatness
A champion we made it, it’s my road, I’ve paved it
If you feel like I feel, you must feel amazing

[Hook:]
You wanna be one, with no one your side
How much longer till we make it now?
We’re all champions, we’re all champions
There’s no giving up, the hunger inside
One day we gonna make it, just …
You’re a champion, you gotta know
We’re all champions, whoa
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
We’re all champions, we’re all champions
We’re all champions
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
We’re all champions, we’re all champions

[B.o.B]
It’s all that I’ve ever know, it’s all that I’ve ever seen
I came here with nothing but I’m a leave with a legacy
A brand new and better me, believe is the recipe
And ain’t no second guessing when you thinking successfully
Taking no for an answer isn’t part of the deal
You see the blood, sweat and tears, we leave it all on the field
We make our dreams reality, you can tell that it’s real
Cause I’m a champion, I live the life I said I would live

[Hook:]
[O.A.R]
Whoa, who’s gonna tell me that it’s not my time?
Who’s gonna tell me that the world ain’t mine?
All of us rise up when the time align
Looking for nothing cause it’s all inside
Running away the of midnight run
Fire, fire, I’m a champion
Higher, higher, it’s my chance
We’re all champions, we’re all champions
We’re all champions, whoa
We’re all champions, we’re all champions
We’re all champions
We’re all champions, we’re all champions

…there’s no more life to break this
Hope is all we got …the stress, the doubt time…
Taste the…be strong, …
songs.title: Champions
